# HSlider

**Inherits:** [Slider](Slider.md) **\<** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A horizontal slider that goes from left (min) to right (max).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A horizontal slider, used to adjust a value by moving a grabber along a horizontal axis. It is a [Range](Range.md)-based control and goes from left (min) to right (max).
